blogPost.excerpt: A free desktop app that sits in your menu bar: — select services you depend on — check their status in your menu bar — get notified when they change their status
blogPost.body: A free desktop app that sits in your menu bar: — select services you depend on — check their status in your menu bar — get notified when they change their status
blogPost.title: Instatus Out - Monitor services in your menu bar
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 一个免费的桌面应用程序，位于您的菜单栏： - 选择您所依赖的服务 - 在您的菜单栏中查看他们的状态 - 当他们改变状态时得到通知。
一個免費的桌面應用程序，位於您的菜單欄： - 選擇您所依賴的服務 - 在您的菜單欄中查看他們的狀態 - 當他們改變狀態時得到通知。

next.excerpt: Stack is an experimental product from Google's internal incubator Area 120 which makes it easy to scan and organize your documents. It uses Google Cloud's Document AI to understand the meaning of the documents you scan, or upload from your camera roll.
next.title: Stack by Area 120 at Google - All your documents, organized with Google's document AI

localize.description: Stack是谷歌内部孵化器Area 120的一款实验性产品，它可以让你轻松扫描和整理文件。它使用谷歌云的文档AI来理解你扫描的文档，或者从你的相机卷上传的文档的含义。
localize.tagline: 你的所有文件，用谷歌的文档AI来组织。

localize.description: Stack是谷歌內部孵化器Area 120的一款實驗性產品，它可以讓你輕鬆掃描和整理文件。它使用谷歌雲的文檔AI來理解你掃描的文檔，或者從你的相機捲上傳的文檔的含義。
localize.tagline: 你的所有文件，用谷歌的文檔AI來組織。
